metadata.title: CVE-2020-2230 jenkins: stored XSS vulnerability in project naming strategy (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in Jenkins in versions prior to 2.251 and LTS 2.235.3. The project naming strategy description, displayed on item creation, is not properly escaped. This can result in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by users with Overall/Manage permissions. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
jenkins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
